steps.task: Refine the user's high-level goal into specific, actionable tasks for the Designer and Engineer roles. This includes defining the scope of the mission statement and vision content.

Generate a design mockup for the HTML page, including layout, color palette, typography, and UI elements. The design should be visually appealing and accessible, reflecting the team's mission and vision.
Review the design mockup and provide feedback to the Designer, ensuring it aligns with the overall goals and accessibility standards. Refine prompts for the Engineer based on the design.
Implement the design mockup into clean, modular, and performant HTML and CSS code. Ensure the page is responsive and accessible, adhering to web standards.
Review the implemented HTML page and provide feedback to the Engineer, focusing on code quality, performance, and accessibility. Refine prompts for any necessary adjustments.
Review the implemented HTML page and provide feedback on the visual aspects, ensuring it matches the original design and is visually appealing.
Make any necessary adjustments to the HTML and CSS code based on the feedback from the Prompt Engineer and Designer.
Perform a final review of the HTML page to ensure it meets all requirements and is ready for deployment. This includes checking for errors, validating accessibility, and optimizing performance.
